statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, location_id, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE location_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, location_id, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 123 AND location_id = 456;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, location_id, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE location_id IN (789, 987);
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT customer_id, location_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id, location_id ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, rating FROM hotels ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, rating FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT attraction_name, review_text, rating FROM tourist_attractions WHERE rating < 4.0 ORDER BY review_text ASC;
SELECT * FROM tourist_attractions WHERE rating = 5.0;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY hotel_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT hotel_name, rating FROM hotels WHERE hotel_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM tourist_attractions WHERE rating > 3.5 ORDER BY attraction_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT attraction_name, review_text, rating FROM tourist_attractions WHERE review_text ILIKE '%beautiful%' ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT * FROM hotels JOIN tourist_attractions ON hotels.rating = tourist_attractions.rating WHERE hotels.rating > 4.0 AND tourist_attractions.rating < 4.0 ORDER BY hotels.hotel_name DESC, tourist_attractions.attraction_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HotelReviews;
SELECT review_id, hotel_id, customer_name, rating FROM HotelReviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM AttractionsReviews WHERE review_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM HotelReviews;
SELECT entity_id, entity_type, rating_value FROM Ratings ORDER BY rating_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM HotelReviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM HotelReviews WHERE hotel_id = 12345 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT review_text FROM AttractionsReviews WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM Ratings WHERE entity_id = 1001 AND entity_type = 'attraction' ORDER BY rating_value DESC;
SELECT hotel_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM HotelReviews GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING total_reviews > 5;
SELECT * FROM hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotels WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM hotels ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews_hotels WHERE rating < 3.0;
SELECT attraction_name, location, rating FROM attractions WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM hotels ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM attractions WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews_hotels WHERE hotel_id = 1 AND rating > 4.0;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM hotels WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews_attractions WHERE review_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM hotel_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM hotels WHERE rating < 4;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT attraction_name, location FROM attractions WHERE category = 'Museum';
SELECT review_text FROM hotel_reviews WHERE hotel_id = 7;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM hotels WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM hotel_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT attraction_name, rating, location FROM attractions WHERE category = 'Museum' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM attraction_reviews WHERE customer_id = 2;
